title: 82 - Jim Belushi's Basement (with Mitch Hurwitz)
description: Mayor Harmon brings Arrested Development's creator Mitch Hurwitz on stage to talk shop about TV. Later Kumail returns and the whole thing ends with an epic D&D session. Quit reading already and press play!
lastTitle: 81 - Hot Dog With Lettuce (Laraine Newman, Dr. Chris Ryan)
